Adverse events within 28 days of first dose and at least possibly related to B7H3-CART were considered dose-limiting toxicities (DLTs) if meeting additional criteria: any grade 5 toxicity, grade 4 cytokine release syndrome, neutropenia, or thrombocytopenia lasting > 14 days, or any non-hematologic grade 3 toxicity lasting > 72 hours. Neurotoxicity was considered a DLT if grade 4 for > 96 hours or new-onset grade 3 for > 28 days.
